Sentencas: Plasma nitriding was applied to ferritic stainless steel substrates to improve their performances as interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell devices.
Titulo: Corrosion behaviour of nitrided ferritic stainless steels for use in solid oxide fuel cell devices

Sentencas: The samples underwent electrical conductivity test and SEM/EDS, TEM/EDS, environmental-SEM analyses.
Titulo: Corrosion behaviour of nitrided ferritic stainless steels for use in solid oxide fuel cell devices

Sentencas: The first stages of corrosion were recorded in-situ with the e-SEM.
Titulo: Corrosion behaviour of nitrided ferritic stainless steels for use in solid oxide fuel cell devices

Sentencas: Nitriding is effective in limiting the undesired chromium evaporation from the steel substrates and accelerates the corrosion kinetics, but its influence of the electrical conductivity is ambiguous.
Titulo: Corrosion behaviour of nitrided ferritic stainless steels for use in solid oxide fuel cell devices

Sentencas: No intergranular corrosion is found in the steel substrate after long time operation.
Titulo: Corrosion behaviour of nitrided ferritic stainless steels for use in solid oxide fuel cell devices

Sentencas: Nitriding helps commercially competitive porous coating to improve chromium retention properties of metal interconnects.
Titulo: Corrosion behaviour of nitrided ferritic stainless steels for use in solid oxide fuel cell devices
